Enjoy your movie time!

Given that you seemed surprised by the intensity in "United 93" and preferred an aviation theme, I'd recommend "The Best Years of Our Lives". It's a poignant drama about World War II veterans returning home, dealing with their experiences and readjusting to civilian life. The film stars Myrna Loy and Dana Andrews.

If you're looking for something more action-packed, "Die Hard 2" might be up your alley. It follows the story of John McClane battling terrorists who have seized control of an airport, with Bruce Willis reprising his iconic role.
